Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement spec-compliant circles and auto-membership

Changes circle system from membership-based to ownership-based propagation
per Elonara Social specification. Implements "Speaking is joining" rule
where posting or replying automatically grants community membership.

- CircleService now queries communities by creator_id instead of membership
- Inner circle: members of communities you created
- Trusted circle: members of communities created by inner members  
- Extended circle: members of communities created by trusted members
- ConversationService auto-adds authors to community_members on create/reply
- Existing participation requires one-time backfill (via backfill script)

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
